column1: Little Goat Diner////We started with the biscuits and gravy
column2: and the gravy was hearty and the biscuit so flaky
column3: it was a good start. Then I had the special menu's lamb with sauted veggies
column4: and my companion got the beef stew. The lamb was tender
column5: and with the contrast of the crunchy veggies
column6: and thin sweet potato glass noodles with some peanut sauce
column7: it was a tasty bite! The meat itself was a little under-seasoned
